subject: Implement comprehensive dashboard race chart improvements
body:
- Keep existing values when selection changes via storedInputValues Map
- Set minimum initial values (1 for non-rate fields, 0 for rate fields)
- Add interactive race chart visualization with play/pause/reset controls
- Remove empty metric cards when all values are null/zero
- Replace winner trophy icons with top-3 highlight system using blue gradients
- Fix null and zero value handling (display "N/A" for null/undefined)
- Add starting customer base field to per-seat model
- Remove recommendation section from executive summary

The race chart provides an animated bar chart showing revenue progression
over time, with manual controls and slider for month-by-month exploration.
Highlights emphasize top 3 performers with different opacity levels.
